programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des lapins affamés / Le Concours de Beauté) S1 (13/26)
programme.desc: «Des lapins affamés / Le Concours de Beauté»CGI animated series. A baby elephant escapes when the circus comes to town.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Muffin dans l'espace / Une limonade qui secoue) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Muffin dans l'espace / Une limonade qui secoue»Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Satellite Flight) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Satellite Flight»Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Toutou Girl et Super Toutou !) S6 (n°618)
programme.desc: «Toutou Girl et Super Toutou !»When supervillain Felina Meow starts turning all the dogs at the annual Dog Show into cats, it's up to superheroes Puppy Girl and Super Pup to stop her! Will they foil her cat-astrophic plan before she turns everyone's pups into kitties?!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin) S1 (9/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin»Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Treehouse) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Treehouse»Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête forraine) S3 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La fête forraine»The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les chiffres) S3 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Les chiffres»Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et les héros du quartier) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Blue et les héros du quartier»Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Stone of Life) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «The Stone of Life»Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Détective Baby Shark) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Détective Baby Shark»When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Fête ton anniversaire avec Blue !) S2 (21/21)
programme.desc: «Fête ton anniversaire avec Blue !»It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a very special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party! As we celebrate, we play games and gather prizes for a pinata!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Ma petite dent) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Ma petite dent»When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Il faut sauver la princesse / La crique des bigorneaux) S1 (4/21)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver la princesse / La crique des bigorneaux»Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Pancakes: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. (S1, ep 4a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des vaches et des cow-boys / Alex, SOS !) S1 (15/26)
programme.desc: «Des vaches et des cow-boys / Alex, SOS !»Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington recycle) S2 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington recycle»Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La maison de Rebecca Rabbit) S2 (39/52)
programme.desc: «La maison de Rebecca Rabbit»Peppa and her entire class go on a school trip to the mountains. There they discover the ultrasound, exchange their lunch and have a wonderful day. And before they get back they also sing the Bing-Bong song!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Alexandre le petit cousin) S2 (31/52)
programme.desc: «Alexandre le petit cousin»Peppa and George's aunt and uncle have a baby and the whole family is visiting. Expectations are high, but the baby cannot do anything yet. Then Peppa and niece Chloe decide that George could also be a very nice baby ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le sentier de randonnée) S2 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le sentier de randonnée»Suzie Sheep comes to play at Peppa's, together with her invisible friend Leo de Leeuw. Peppa has to get used to it, but soon she is playing Suzie's game, just like Papa and Mama Pig. Only George finds it difficult.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Shooting Star) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Shooting Star»Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Circus Celebration) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Circus Celebration»Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos»Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des Manchots en Détresse / Le Bébé Dauphin) S2 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Des Manchots en Détresse / Le Bébé Dauphin»Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now it's up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pup Save a Lonely Ghost: Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends. (S9, ep 12b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Au pied de l'arc-en-ciel / Grillés !) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Au pied de l'arc-en-ciel / Grillés !»The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp) S1 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp»Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Une vie de star / Méchant Hank) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Une vie de star / Méchant Hank»The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'mores) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «S'mores»Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué»When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rainy Day Roundup) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Rainy Day Roundup»When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La chasse au trésor) S1 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Secrets Box) S1 (n°31)
programme.desc: «The Secrets Box»Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pas très bien) S1 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Pas très bien»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami imaginaire) S2 (37/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami imaginaire»Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa. Suzy has made up a pretend friend called "Leo Lion". Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy announces that Leo likes roaring and he likes playing dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along with the game. But Peppa's little brother George cannot see Leo and feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le correspondant) S2 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le correspondant»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les histoires fantastiques de Blaze) S5 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Les histoires fantastiques de Blaze»Blaze and AJ are babysitting for Baby Gherkin! When it's time for her nap, they tell her three epic bedtime stories about police, cowboys, and superheroes - all starring Blaze and his friends!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (The Chicken Circus!) S4 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Chicken Circus!»Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus! But when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une livraison en péril / Le télésiège) S1 (9/26)
programme.desc: «Une livraison en péril / Le télésiège»109A - PUPS SAVE THE TREATS When Mr. Porters van full of puppy food and treats slides on the ice near the shore; (without Mr, Porter in it) Ryder and the PAW Patrol must safely get the van off the ice and save the treats! 109B - PUPS GET A LIFT Katie and her cat Cali are enjoying a day up on Jakes mountain when the chair lift stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down and it's getting colder! Ryder and the Paw Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des lapins affamés / Le Concours de Beauté) S1 (13/26)
programme.desc: «Des lapins affamés / Le Concours de Beauté»CGI animated series. A baby elephant escapes when the circus comes to town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le terrain de jeu) S3 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Le terrain de jeu»Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Goldie le poisson) S3 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Goldie le poisson»Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête forraine) S3 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La fête forraine»The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.desc: «Ma petite dent»When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down.

programme.desc: «Il faut sauver la princesse / La crique des bigorneaux»Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Pancakes: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. (S1, ep 4a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des vaches et des cow-boys / Alex, SOS !) S1 (15/26)
programme.desc: «Des vaches et des cow-boys / Alex, SOS !»Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington recycle) S2 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington recycle»Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La panne de courant) S2 (47/52)
programme.desc: «La panne de courant»One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa's house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. Peppa is surprised to find that even the television won't work without electricity. While the family wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play in the dark.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de Papa Pig) S2 (50/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de Papa Pig»Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Sleepover) S2 (n°51)
programme.desc: «Sleepover»Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoë Zebra's house. Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant are all coming to the sleepover too. The girls are are too excited to go to sleep. They stay up playing games and having fun. They play songs on a piano, have a midnight feast and take it in turns to tell a story. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Very Busy Afternoon) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «A Very Busy Afternoon»Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Four-Leaf Clover) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «The Four-Leaf Clover»Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant) S2 (n°215)
programme.desc: «Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête costumée de Blue) S1 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La fête costumée de Blue»Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Marcus, Seul Dans la Tour de Contrôle / La Pat'patrouille Sauve les Cerfs) S2 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Marcus, Seul Dans la Tour de Contrôle / La Pat'patrouille Sauve les Cerfs»The puppies go skydiving but Marshall doesn't dare to participate. He may stay at home to watch the Lookout. The bay is frozen, and a few deer cross the bay to find food.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !»When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Meteor Shower / Paddington and the Talent Show) S1 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Meteor Shower / Paddington and the Talent Show»Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon»Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade, but instead of cutting lemons, they cut corners and learn if something's worth doing, it's worth doing right.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs»When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Busy Baby) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Busy Baby»Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Nap»Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le château aux 4 vents) S1 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Le château aux 4 vents»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma cousine Chloé) S1 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Ma cousine Chloé»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Cuddle Toy) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Cuddle Toy»Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubble Trouble) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Bubble Trouble»Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Party Time) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Party Time»Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toux de Pedro) S3 (3/52)
programme.desc: «La toux de Pedro»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bibliothèque) S3 (4/52)
programme.desc: «La bibliothèque»Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Héros de Jeu Vidéo) S5 (16/20)
programme.desc: «Héros de Jeu Vidéo»Blaze and AJ are super excited to play their new video game. But when a video game wizard makes the game come alive, Blaze and AJ must level up and save Axle City from pixel pandemonium.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Pneus fabuleux) S4 (10/20)
programme.desc: «Pneus fabuleux»When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.
